General.Name: Ovation Science Inc
General.Description: Ovation Science Inc. engages in the production, sub-licensing and sales of cannabis or hemp products in Canada, the United States, and Mexico. The company's Invisicare is a patented drug delivery technology for use in topical and transdermal cannabis products under the Ovation. It offers recreation transdermal cream under the BASKiN names; cannabidiol health and wellness solutions under the Invibe MD name; skincare solutions under the ARLO CBD name; and hand sanitizers under the DermSafe name. Ovation Science Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 625 Howe street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T6
